title: An intro to animal sounds
text: basic example shows solve common problem:
code: library(animalsounds) ## basic example code animal_sounds("dog", "woof") #> [1] "The dog says woof!"

title: Animal Sounds Function — animal_sounds
text: Function takes two inputs (animal, sound), produces string animal sounds like

title: Animal Sounds Function — animal_sounds
text: animal string input e.g. "dog", "lion", etc. sound Another string input e.g. "woof", "roar" etc.
